content: blend yarn citizen harmony fingering with the brand new trinity cashmere and let this creation by lena skvagerson reignite your passion for knitting adorned with charming cabled stitches this accessory is sure to keep your valentine delightfully warm and snug **skill level** intermediate **size** one size **finished measurements** 20 circumference x 12 long after blocking **gauge** holding 1 strand of each yarn together 22 sts and 29 rnds = 4 inches/10cm in pat blocked take time to check gauge **materials** yarn citizen harmony fingering fingering weight 50% wool 50% alpaca 419yds/100g per hank 1 hank of natural yarn citizen trinity cashmere lace weight 49% super baby alpaca 39% mulberry silk 12% cashmere 247yds/25g per ball 1 ball of natural **needles ** us size 5 3 75mm 16-inch circular needles or size needed to obtain gauge **notions ** stitch marker cable needle and tapestry needle
